cast.name: 克雷格·罗伯特·布鲁斯 Craig Robert Bruss

director.name: 克雷格·罗伯特·布鲁斯 Craig Robert Bruss

introduction: Dalton returns to Rancho Palos Verdes, CA after hiding out for a year due to his father Match-Stick's death. Match-Stick was hunted down and killed by the Triad leader Mr. Tang. Dalton suffers with PTSD from being a Navy Seal Veteran in the "War On Terror" and he tries to come up with coping mechanisms to deal with his PTSD. Dalton finds out he has a half brother out of wedlock who takes over the Hollywood Mob. DEA Agent Prasad recruits Dalton to go undercover into the Lunada Bay surfing gang to find out who's supplying the drug Galaxy. There's plenty of action and family drama.
